00105    template <class HDS> 
00106    struct MutableHDSConcept {
00108 
00113       typedef typename hds_traits<HDS>::halfedge_descriptor halfedge_descriptor; 
00115 
00119       void constraints() {
00120          using namespace boost;
00121          function_requires<HDSConcept<HDS> >();
00122 
00123          set_opposite(hds,h1,h2);
00124          h = new_edge(hds,h1,h2);
00125          delete_edge(hds,h1,h2);
00126          const_constraints(hds);
00127       }
00128

00133          set_opposite(hds,h1,h2);
00134          h = new_edge(hds,h1,h2);
00135          delete_edge(hds,h1,h2);
00136       }
